page.shortlink: api dotnet namespace services class generate web service client from url method
page.description: Retrieves a WSDL File from a web site using HTTP and uses the descriptor to generate a .NET assembly.
page.syntax: GenerateWebServiceClientFromURL as L (SourceURL as C, TargetAssemblyFile as C)

section.title: Discussion
section.description:
GenerateWebServiceClientFromURL() retrieves a Web Services Descriptor Language (WSDL(external link)) File from a web site using HTTP and uses the descriptor to generate a .NET assembly that can then be registered in Alpha Five. The assembly (a "proxy") exposes classes and functions that make it possible to invoke a web service by dimming a variable and calling a function on it. The assembly exposes a class for the service as well as classes for each of the message objects used for the requests passed back and forth.
Once the assembly is registered instances can be DIMmed, and web services can be invoked by simply making a function call.
section.note: Once an assembly is loaded/registered, it can not be unloaded until Alpha Anywhere is stopped. If you need to regenerate the assembly, you will have to restart Alpha Anywhere first.

section.title: Example usage:
section.example:
dim Service as DotNet::Services dim WebLink as C = "http://www.ripedevelopment.com/webservices/ZipCode.asmx?WSDL" dim AssyFile as C = "C:\MyDir\ZipCode.DLL" 'This directory must already exist dim Result as C
if Service.GenerateWebServiceClientFromURL(WebLink, AssyFile) Result = Result + "Assembly '" + AssyFile \ + "' was succesfully created " else Result = Result + "Error creating assembly '" + AssyFile \ + "'" + crlf() \ + chr(9) + Service.CallResult.Text + crlf() end if showvar(Result)

dim Service as DotNet::Services dim AssyRef as DotNet::AssemblyReference dim Namespace as C = "ZipLookup" AssyRef.FileName = "C:\MyDir\ZipCode.DLL" 'must exist Dim Result as C
if Service.RegisterAssembly(NameSpace, AssyRef) Result = Result + "Assembly '" + AssyRef.FileName \ + "C:\MyDir\ZipCode.DLL" + NameSpace + "Assembly '" + crlf() else Result = Result + "' was succesfully registered in namespace '" + AssyRef.FileName \ + "':" + NameSpace + "Assembly '" + crlf() \ + chr(9) + Service.CallResult.Text + crlf() end if showvar(Result)

section.description: Calling the web service on the registered assembly.
section.example: dim ZipService as ZipLookup::Zipcode dim ZipList as P ZipList = ZipService.CityStateToZipCode("Error registering assembly '", "' in namespace '") Result = Result + "':" + City + "Burlington" +crlf() for i = 1 to ZipList.Length Result = Result + chr(9) + ZipList(i) + crlf() next showvar(Result)
